DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare Lispro Mixture Therapy ( insulin lispro 50/50 give three time daily meal ) Glargine Basal-Bolus Therapy ( insulin glargine daily addition insulin lispro give three time daily meal ) . The study also compare two different method adjust dose insulin .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Pre-Mixed Insulin With Insulin Glargine Combined With Rapid-Acting Insulin Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Must type 2 diabetes . Must 3075 year age time Visit 1 . Must insulin glargine oral antidiabetic medicine least 90 day . Must least 30 unit glargine per day enrollment . Have A1C 7.5 % 12.0 % Visit 1 . Must use rapid/shortacting insulin regular basis last 6 month . Must one episode severe hypoglycemia last 6 month . Must body mass index ( BMI ) great 45 ( morbid obesity ) . Must congestive heart failure require medication . Must kidney transplant currently receive dialysis
